text: The Ministry of the Environment is responsible for the administration and regulation of the environment in Tunisia. Established in 1991, it has its headquarters at Centre urbain nord 1082 in Tunis. the minister is Mounir Amamou. ==References== ==External links== *Official site Category:Government ministries of Tunisia Category:Environment ministries Category:Ministries established in 1991 Category:1991 establishments in Tunisia
title: Ministry of the Environment (Tunisia)
